titles.title: O My Soul, Bless Your Redeemer

comments.comment: This hymnal has not been proofed - data may be incomplete or incorrect

verse.name: v1
v2
verse.lines: God forgives all your transgressions, all diseases gently heals; God redeems you from destruction, and with you so kindly deals.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Far as east from west is distant, God has put away our sin; like the pity of a father has the Lord's compassion been.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: As it was without beginning, so it lasts without an end; to their children's children ever shall God's righteousness extend.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Unto such as keep God's covâ€™nant and are steadfast in God's way; unto those who still remember the commandments and obey.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: Bless your Maker, all you creatures, ever under God's control, all throughout God's vast dominion; bless the Lord of all, my soul!
